description:
Kululu`s latest gun turns serious ninja Dororo into a slacker and slacker Keroro into a serious disciplinarian. And when the Natsumi`s grandmother pays a visit for New Year`s, Koyuki develops a special bond with her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, the New Year, Birth of New Keroro / Koyuki, Granny is Coming
Nouvelle année, nouveau Keroro / Grand-mère est venue
ケロロ 新年・新生ケロロ誕生 であります / 小雪 おばあちゃんがやって来た であります
